goal.tools.debugger

Class DebugSettingSynchronizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.debugger.DebugSettingSynchronizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class DebugSettingSynchronizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    This listener listens to the debug settings in the Preferences and copies the pause settings to the agent's debugger. This object is owned by the MonitoringService.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DebugSettingSynchronizer(SteppingDebugger debugger)
      Creates a debug observer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Catch changes in preferences in DebugPreferencePanel, so that pause actions can be handled.
      void stop()

      • DebugSettingSynchronizer

        public DebugSettingSynchronizer(SteppingDebugger debugger)
        Creates a debug observer.
        Parameters:
        name - name to be assigned to debug observer.
        debugger - debugger to which the observer has been subscribed.

        public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
